changeSet.sql: WITH active_personages AS ( SELECT mio.ordering_personage_id as personage_id FROM menu_item_order mio INNER JOIN menu_item mi ON mio.menu_item_id = mi.id WHERE mi.code IN ('olivier', 'champagne', 'gluhwein') AND mio.expire_date_time >= '2025-12-01' AND mio.expire_date_time < '2026-02-01' GROUP BY mio.ordering_personage_id ) INSERT INTO personage_available_badge (personage_id, badge_id, is_active) SELECT p.personage_id, b.id, false FROM active_personages p, badge b WHERE b.code = 'new-year-2026';
